text: Þis is se quide þe Alfric biquath er he ofer se ferde.
Þat is erst Lodne into seynt Eadmunde be wude and by felde and be fenne so ful & so forth so ic it formist ahte.
And ic an þat lond at Birthe into seynt Aþeldrithe so ful & so forth so ic it bigeten hauede eyþer on wude oþer on felde and into Holm to sancte Benedicte Berton al so ful & so forth so ic it ahte.
And ic an into Rameseye six marc silures and þat schal Godric mine brother lesten.
& ic an Þurwineholm into Lodne and Fuglholm into Berhe.
And þa schep delen men on to, half into Lodne & half into Beorthe.
And ic biquethe to min heregete ane marc goldes and þat schal Godric mine brother lesten.
And Alfric biscop I biquethe mine teld & min bedreaf þat ic best hauede vt on mi fare mid me.
& be Alfric biscop & Tofi Prude & þrunni þese quides mundes hureþinge þat it no man awende.
& gif it wa wille awenden God almithen awende is ansene fram hym on domesday.
